name: C Project
description: Realization of a messaging service on a local network in C language in pairs. The project took place in the form of a sprint, in which certain functionalities were imposed, and a deliverable had to be submitted at the end of each sprint. The last sprint left us the choice on the features we wanted to implement.

name: WEB Project
description: Realization of a complete web application in 20 days on a free theme, in fullstack. The choice of the subject turned to an application making it possible to save a person's sports activities, to consult their statistics, to follow the wear and tear of their equipment as well as to find out about the competitions available.

name: IoT Project
description: Free subject for each pair. Realization of a sports assistant allowing to coach a sportsman during the exercise, as well as a website to save and consult the data relating to the training. The sports assistant uses several sensors such as an ultrasonic sensor, buttons, but also an LCD screen.

name: Algorithmic Project
description: Make the functional specifications and the main program of a game (Quarto) by pair, recover the functional specifications and the main program of another game (Mabula) from another pair and do the development.
